title: Envy
verses: James 3:16 (WEB) — “Where jealousy and selfish ambition are, there is confusion and every evil deed.”
Galatians 5:26 (WEB) — “Let’s not become conceited… envying one another.”
Proverbs 14:30 (WEB) — “A tranquil heart gives life to the flesh, but envy rots the bones.”
Philippians 4:11 (WEB) — “I have learned to be content.”
body: Envy drains life and blinds you to gifts already given. Name it, confess it, and practice gratitude. Rejoice in others’ blessings as signs of the Father’s generosity.
prayer: Generous God, free my heart from envy. Teach me contentment and gratitude. Help me celebrate others and trust Your timing for me. Amen.
